name: European Association of Industrial Silica Producers
membership: EUROSIL is a member of IMA-Europe, the European Industrial Minerals Association.
goal: EUROSIL is a comprehensive source of information for all issues relevant to the industrial silica industry with the exception of issues that might affect the free competition amongst its members. The association provides its members with a forum in which to tackle regulatory, technical, health and safety and environmental issues and assures the representation of industrial silica at national and EU authority levels.
interests: Business and Industry, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Food Safety
euInitiatives:
Employment and social affairs: Occupational health & safety issues, social dialogue.
REACH and chemical policies.
